name: GO - Media Renderer
upgrade_notice: Introducing video rendering : Image renderer becomes media renderer. Now rendering videos with a custom player and multiple fields and options with it (mute, autoplay,...)
author: Grow Online

sections.description: Display medias with render_image() & render_video(), powerfull and light functions that brings performance and accessibility to your theme.
sections.installation: Download and install the archive in your Wordpress site. Use render_image() & render_video() function to display lightweight and responsive images/videos. An easy way to gain accessibility and performances.
sections.changelog: 2.0/n/n• NEW : Added render_video function !/nImage renderer now is media_renderer !.1.5.1/n/n• TWEAK : Force portrait mode was'nt working proprely./n/n• TWEAK : Mime type was changed on every media including svgs, a fix has been applied./n/n1.4.9/n/n• TWEAK : Mime type was changed on every media including video./n/n/n1.4.8/n/n• TWEAK : Fixed differences between mime types and image formats./n/n/nPreviously/n/n• WARNING : changed 'loading_type' to 'defer' bool./n• TWEAK : fixed a bug where placeholder image was not used as a fallback./n• TWEAK : ACF field are now generated in the plugin.
sections.custom_section: This is a custom section labeled 'Custom Section'.
